Class IncomeController

java.lang.Object
IncomeController
public class IncomeController extends Object
Controller class for managing income-related operations. Acts as an intermediary between the application and the income data repository, providing methods to add, update, delete, and list income records.
Author:
Kholod Ahmed

  • Constructor Details

    • IncomeController

      public IncomeController(IncomeRepository database)
      Constructs an IncomeController with the specified repository.
      Parameters:
      database - the income repository to be used for data operations

  • Method Details

    • addIncome

      public boolean addIncome(Income income)
      Adds a new income record to the repository if the amount is valid.
      Parameters:
      income - the income object to be added
      Returns:
      true if the income was successfully saved and the amount is positive, false otherwise

    • updateIncome

      public boolean updateIncome(Income income)
      Updates an existing income record in the repository.
      Parameters:
      income - the income object with updated information
      Returns:
      true if the income was found and successfully updated, false otherwise

    • deleteIncome

      public boolean deleteIncome(int userId, int IncomeId)
      Deletes an income record from the repository.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user whose income is to be deleted
      IncomeId - the ID of the income record to be deleted
      Returns:
      true if the income was found and successfully deleted, false otherwise

    • listIncome

      public List<Income> listIncome(int userId)
      Retrieves a list of all income records for a specific user.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user whose incomes are to be retrieved
      Returns:
      a list of Income objects belonging to the specified user
